arts.ttl: Serie A | Genoa 1-0 Udinese – Emphatic Zanoli enough for Vieira victory
arts.sum: An emphatic finish from Alessandro Zanoli was enough for Genoa to secure all three points...

arts.ttl: Serie A: Genoa vs. Udinese – Confirmed line-ups and updates
arts.sum: The line-ups are in for the first match in the 31st round of Serie A...
Napoli are hoping to close the gap to league leaders Inter Milan at the top of the Serie A standings and Aaron Rogan has predictions for all 10 games in Italy's top-flight this weekend.

arts.ttl: Mario Balotelli caused 'big mess' at Man City but club icon denies fighting him
arts.sum: Manchester City legend Yaya Toure accused Mario Balotelli of making a "big mess" during his time at the club but feels more could have been done to help the striker flourish

Genoa are coming off a 1-0 defeat to Juventus in the previous round, as they remain in 12th place with 35 points. On the other hand, Udinese almost fought their way back to a draw after a tough first...

arts.ttl: Arsenal failed to sign 'next Patrick Vieira' after six-month trial due to paperwork issue
arts.sum: Arsene Wenger has been open when revealing the host of talent he missed out on signing for Arsenal including the likes of Lionel Messi, Cristiano Ronaldo and Gareth Bale
